root: ^Video explains that Exodus uploaded everyone's consciousness if they had one of their earbuds, vaporizing bodies instantly. Everyone now lives in a virtual 'metaworld'. But there is a core group of rebels against this company who still exist in the world and are trying to find a way of life in this post-Exodus planet. They give you the directions to come find them. You decide to carry on the legacy of humanity and find the fellow rebels. As the sun sets on the city, you realize that this is a post-human era. With so many cyber modifications, perhaps you're not even human anymore. But perhaps that's ok, and it's time to start anew.  Perhaps you were detained for the purpose of humanity remaining
